#summary Delivery check list ProMO check before delivery at home and after installation

== Delivery check list ProMO ==

 * Screen resolution (set to 1366 x 786)
 * Check auto and set PC system volume high and adjust TV volume to get a nice sound.
 * Is there a link to the latest stable and for release complide binary placed in the "startup" folder?
 * Make sure that the database is filled with a up to date wordlist.
